sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Grid } from '@material-ui/core' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ seeMoreButton: { transition: "all 0.3s ease", cursor: 'pointer', backgroundColor: 'black', display: 'block', justifyContent: 'center', alignItems: 'center', padding: 10, width: '100%', outline: 'none', border: 'none', position: 'relative', padding: "20px", backgroundColor: 'white', color: 'black', border: '1px solid black', fontSize: '14px', textTransform: 'capitalize', fontWeight: 'bold', cursor: 'pointer', display: 'inline-block', alignItems: 'center', zIndex: 1, '& $span':{ marginRight: '10px', fontFamily: 'Montserrat, sans-serif', letterSpacing: '.1em', color: 'white', fontSize: '12px', textTransform: 'uppercase', }, "&:after":{ content: '""', display:"block", position: 'absolute', left: 0, top: 0, width: '0%', height: '101%', backgroundColor: 'black', borderRadius: 0, transition:"0.3s ease 0s, left 0.3s ease 0s", }, "&:hover:after":{ width: "100%", zIndex:-1, }, "&:hover":{ color:'white', }, }, })) const SeeMoreButton = ({onClick}) => { const classes = useStyles(); return ( ) } export default SeeMoreButton;
